title: High Malaria Incidence
description: In 2023, Benin had a malaria incidence rate of 363.4 per 1,000 population at risk, one of the highest in the world.

title: Low Diabetes Prevalence
description: In 2021, only 1.1% of Benin's population aged 20 to 79 had diabetes, one of the lowest rates globally.

title: Limited Access to Sanitation
description: As of 2022, only 2.7% of Benin's population had access to safely managed sanitation services, among the lowest worldwide.
